generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and lined with parked cars and buildings.
- building: Several buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, especially on the left side and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the right side of the road, and several cars are visible driving in the distance.
- bus: A large public transport bus is visible on the left side of the road, moving in the same direction as the viewpoint.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible above the road, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible on poles along the right side of the road, including a "No Parking" sign and a "200 m" sign.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- rider: No rider is visible in the image.
